resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Distance and direction shown on map
 · New: Confirmation on backup/restore
 · New: Sort events of same date by time (if recognized from cache description)
 · New: Show rudimentary details for geocaching.com.au swaggies
 · New: Weekday shown in event lists
 · New: Filter for caches with offline logs
 · New: Show hint in compass
 · New: Allow export of waypoints without coords to Locus
 · Fix: Don't allow logs in the future
 · Fix: Allow shortcut creation for All caches list
 · Fix: Some menus not available when invoking map from compass
 · Fix: Do not limit to 10 logs for OC caches
